title: Capstone Project - AI Based emotion comparison App
question:
Background information

The AI based Emotion Comparison App will compare the different emotions between two pictures and display the output.

Project objective

The app should capture photos of two people using the Camera component in Thunkable. Alternatively, it should allow the user to pick any two pictures from the gallery in the mobile device. The two photos should then be compared and their emotion details be displayed as output.

Requirements

Here are the milestones you need to achieve to finish this project


Additional Challenge

Modify the app to recognize more emotions, such as anger, fear, disgust, surprise and neutral. Make it display their values on the interface.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
